title: Minion Block
body: Please rito, whatever you changed last patch, unchange it. The minion block is beyond ridiculous this patch.

replies.body: Oh... Was it changed? I thought I was just retarded.
Yeah, even since last patch minion block has been absolutely insane, much, much worse than it used to be...
It totally hasn't been completely fucked for ages, I am not sure what could possibly make you think such [absurd](https://youtu.be/23MaabtAlr4?t=18s) things.
